bypasses.notes: Exercise caution when using kernel-level bypasses. Not working on unc0ver (14.6+) due to libkrw needing an update.
bypasses.name: vnodebypass
bypasses.appNotes: Only works on libhooker-based jailbreaks (e.g Taurine). Even with vnodebypass, jailbreak detection trips, but you can keep using the app.

bypasses.notes: Only works with Cydia Substrate/Substitute (checkra1n/unc0ver), not libhooker.
bypasses.name: SxBypass

bypasses.notes: If you're not willing to use a kernel bypass, try spamming the home bar like in [this video](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/911121069132382250/933587034302476328/RPReplay_Final1642654374.mp4)
